author: cnbc.com
title: Barrick Announces Dividend
text:
TORONTO, Barrick Gold Corporation (NYSE:ABX)(TSX:ABX) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a dividend for the quarter of U.S. 3 cents per share, payable on June 15, 2018, to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 31, 2018. 1

1 The declaration and payment of dividends is at the discretion of the Board of Directors, and will depend on the Companyâ€™s financial results, cash requirements, future prospects, and other factors deemed relevant by the Board.
Source:Barrick Gold Corporation
